Pre-Game Insights: South Africa suffered a shock defeat in a T20I against Ireland last month.
Ireland will aim to repeat that performance in the longer format.
This will be the first time the UAE will host an ODI between Ireland and South Africa.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The previous bilateral series between these two teams ended 1-1.
Abu Dhabi's Sheikh Zayed Stadium will host all the games in this series.
Others: Ireland's only ODI victory against South Africa came in a bilateral match at The Village in 2021.
South Africa have won three out of their last five ODIs against Ireland.
